title: The Bright land
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Guy Glover and Morten Parker
brief_description: This tour of the islands in the West Indies Federation looks at the various resources of the islands, including sugar, coffee, bananas, oil, and bauxite. Good contrast between the beauty of the landscape and life on the land, with the moderninity of city life.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Guy Glover and Morten Parker
